channel.title: Server wont go online? HELP
channel.description:
Im running no-IP, i have it set for soul-scape.servegame.com but nobody can get on...
The smiley face is yellow and smiling with blushed cheeks.
I might have to port forward, but i have no clue how with my router, portforward.com doesnt have verizon routers, and thats what i have.
ANY SUGGESTIONS?
BTW: YES THE SERVER IS RUNNING ON PORT 43594[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2008, 03:55:43 PM[/size][hr]anyone have a verizon router?

item.title: Server wont go online? HELP
item.dc:creator: @Bloody_Wolf Bloody Wolf
item.description:
@Bloody_Wolf wrote:

I GOT IT WORKING, NEVERMIND

W000000T

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont go online? HELP
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

[quote=“Fun 4 me not u, post:2, topic:218187”]I’d hate to say it, but I don’t think there is such thing as a Verizon Router. It’s a Verizon Modem. And using a Modem, there are NO ports to forward. I may be wrong though, as I do not use Verizon.

COMCAST ALL DA WAY[/quote]

Yes there is a Verizon Router.

Read full topic
